Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR following Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that lead to Request Payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR by STAFF MEMBER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR that are not followed by Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Payment Handled' does not happen

Name: Ratio of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR over Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR followed by Payment Handled out of all Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR preceded by Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in the most common process variant
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in cases with Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average number of days between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in cases with Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION but without Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in cases exceeding the average processing time
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities
